instructions.information: Patient has noticed swelling in ankles recently, possibly related to lisinopril. Blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90. Patient sometimes forgets the evening dose of medication.
Hypertension: Blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90.
Review kidney function tests before making any changes to medication.
